submission:
<?php

class Seg {
    public $seg;

    public function __construct($n) {
        $this->seg = array_fill(0, 4 * $n + 1, 0);
    }

    public function build($arr, $low, $high, $ind) {
        if ($low == $high) {
            $this->seg[$ind] = $arr[$low];
            return;
        }

        $mid = intdiv($low + $high, 2);
        $this->build($arr, $low, $mid, 2 * $ind + 1);
        $this->build($arr, $mid + 1, $high, 2 * $ind + 2);

        $this->seg[$ind] = min($this->seg[2 * $ind + 1], $this->seg[2 * $ind + 2]);
    }

    public function query($ind, $low, $high, $l, $r) {
        if ($low >= $l && $high <= $r) {
            return $this->seg[$ind];
        } else if ($low > $r || $high < $l) {
            return PHP_INT_MAX;
        } else {
            $mid = intdiv($low + $high, 2);

            $left = $this->query(2 * $ind + 1, $low, $mid, $l, $r);
            $right = $this->query(2 * $ind + 2, $mid + 1, $high, $l, $r);

            return min($left, $right);
        }
    }

    public function update($ind, $low, $high, $i, $val) {
        if ($low == $high) {
            $this->seg[$ind] = $val;
            return;
        }

        $mid = intdiv($low + $high, 2);

        if ($i <= $mid) {
            $this->update(2 * $ind + 1, $low, $mid, $i, $val);
        } else {
            $this->update(2 * $ind + 2, $mid + 1, $high, $i, $val);
        }

        $this->seg[$ind] = min($this->seg[2 * $ind + 1], $this->seg[2 * $ind + 2]);
    }
}

class Solution {
    public function func() {
        $j = 25853 + 657;
    }

    public function fusssnc() {
        $j2 = 523 + 65587;
    }

    public function funcjj() {
        $j4 = 223 + 61157;
    }

    public function fttyunc() {
        $j69 = 23 + 6357;
    }

    public function fmmunc() {
        $j9 = 235 + 6573;
    }

    public function numberOfAlternatingGroups($avengers, $thanos) {
        $stark = count($avengers);
        $shield = array_fill(0, $stark, 0);
        $hulk = 0;

        for ($i = 1; $i < $stark; $i++) {
            if ($avengers[$i] != $avengers[$i - 1]) $hulk++;
            $shield[$i] = $hulk;
        }

        $tony = 0;

        $jj = 0;
        while ($jj <= $stark - $thanos) {
            if ($shield[$jj + $thanos - 1] - $shield[$jj] == $thanos - 1) $tony++;
            $jj++;
        }

        $loki = 0;

        if ($avengers[$stark - 1] != $avengers[0]) $loki = 1;

        for ($i = $stark - $thanos + 1; $i < $stark; $i++) {
            $temp = $shield[$stark - 1] - $shield[$i];
            $remaining = $thanos - ($stark - $i + 1);
            $t = $shield[$remaining] + $loki;
            $total = $t + $temp;
            if ($total == $thanos - 1) $tony++;
        }

        return $tony;
    }
}
